item.title: Pairing with junior developers
item.description: After reading this blog post, here are my thoughts: WARNING: the post was about how to do it, these reflections are on a more philosophical level This is a controversial topic, as: You cannot discern how much or little the other person knows more than you. I cannot find the reference anymore, but it was a to the tune of “once the other person’s level is higher than yours, you cannot know how much” There are different knowledge areas.
